We hear concerns about the accountability of these funds. 

Some have complained that these fundraising efforts inaccurately describe our country & reflect badly on our national image.

We urge donors to such efforts to exercise caution & good judgment in making their donations.

One of the unique qualities of Ethiopians is our tradition of generosity. 

We come together whenever we face difficulties.

No one can witness 2 palindromic days. All of us alive now are privileged to witness this day. 

“There’s not much point to being alive if you don’t do what you can to make life better for someone else” 

Let’s make sure to influence our world positively while healthy & alive!

I learned “palindromic” means a sequence of characters that read the same forward & backward like “madam” & “909”.

Today is the 2nd day in 1000 years that can be written the same way forward & backward: 02/02/2020. 

The 1st was 01/01/1010 & the next-in 909 years: 03/03/3030.

Ethiopian Epiphany (Timket) is a colorful celebration all over Ethiopia & in parts of the world where many Ethiopians live. Usually it take 2-3 days. January 20 is a public holiday in Ethiopia & because of another event it is also a public holiday in the US. https://t.co/Y2SsvM6rja

Ethiopia has a special coffee ceremony. 
1st wash the beans
2nd roast in a pan until you see aromatic smoke, you can also let others enjoy the smell, 
3rd ground  
4th brew slowly
